basic.description: A continuation of GRMN 102/3.0 aimed at expanding basic language skills (listening, reading, writing and speaking). Students will review and deepen their knowledge of grammatical structures through exposure to a variety of German-language media and culture.
basic.subject: GRMN
basic.title: Intermediate German I

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite    A grade of C in GRMN102 or permission of the Department of Languages, Literatures and Cultures.
